about_the_game:
Once upon a time, there was a black rabbit with a wild temper who lived an outcast life outside the Deep Wood forest. One day, all of his special carrot crops disappeared! He embarks on a wild adventure to find the thief, using his powers of observation as well as his martial arts skills on anyone who gets in his way, even if it means taking on an entire forest!



But things are more complicated than he thinks.
A wacky point-and-click adventure game set in a fairy tale forest with a dark secret.

FEATURES

• Beautiful 2D hand drawn backgrounds and animation.

• A unique story with lots of twists.

• Hilarious characters, featuring lot of fairytales icons.

• Funny situations and dialogues.

• Satisfying and balanced puzzles.

• Original soundtrack.



STAY TUNED: Monthly/bimonthly demo updates until final release!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Funny fighting scenes and in some scenes some blood is depicted. Drugs and alcohol consumption are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A fairytale forest in decay. A black rabbit ready to fight... and a king lion who only looks out for himself. Unlock new skills and discover who stole your carrots in a humorous adventure full of fun puzzles and mutated kickass moves.
